# Overview


# Packages 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```


# Data 

```{r}

lc_soil = read_csv("../data/2025-08-08_SpatialData/soilGrid/staticSoil30cm_LC.csv")
lcc_soil = read_csv("../data/2025-08-08_SpatialData/soilGrid/staticSoil30cm_LCC.csv")
lcc_scale = read_csv("../data/2025-08-08_SpatialData/soilGrid/staticSoil30cm_scaleFactor_LCC.csv")
lcc_soil_1m = read_csv("../data/2025-08-08_SpatialData/soilGrid/staticSoil_100cm_LCC.csv")
soil_old = read_csv("../data/static/2025-08-08_staticSoil250_LCC.csv")
```


# View Data

```{r}
lc_soil
lcc_soil
lcc_soil_1m
soil_old
```
```{r}

lcc_soil_1m %>% select(-`system:index`, -.geo, -fireYr, -lat, -lon) %>% relocate (ID)
```

```{r}

lcc_soil %>% select(-`system:index`, -.geo, -fireYr, -lat, -lon) %>% relocate (ID)
```

```{r}
soil_old %>% select(-`system:index`, -.geo, -fireYr, -lat, -lon) %>% relocate (ID)
```
